General.Name: Srinanaporn Marketing Public Company Limited
General.Description: Srinanaporn Marketing Public Company Limited produces, sells, and distributes snacks and beverages in Thailand and internationally. The company offers ready to drink jellies under the Jele and Jele Beautie brand names; squid snacks under the Bento brand; biscuit sticks and seaweed sticks under the Lotus brand name; and coconut juice, soy milk, tamarind, grape juice, black lemon tea, and melon drinks under the Magic Farm brand. It also provides wafers under the Chocky brand; biscuits under the Bakery House and Dorkbua brand names; and mineral water under the AQUAVITZ brand, as well as provides hemp products comprising mixed hemp seed seaweed and fruit juice with cannabis water. The company exports its products to Laos, Cambodia, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Myanmar, the Philippines, Singapore, China, etc. Srinanaporn Marketing Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
